product_name: Backcountry Access Float 27 Tech Avalanche Airbag Pack
long_description: The most technical airbag pack from Backcountry Access, the Float 27 Tech is designed for mountaineering and riding in complex terrain and features an inflatable airbag for an extra margin of safety.
short_description: The most technical airbag pack from Backcountry Access, the Float 27 Tech is designed for mountaineering and riding in complex terrain and features an inflatable airbag for an extra margin of safety.
